column1: My father was Algerian, my mother Spanish.
Why don't you try on this yellow sweater?
Mary said she was too tired to help you do that.
Is there a book in the desk? "No, there isn't."
I have been meaning to go to Berlin, but keep putting it off. I'll get around to it soon.
When was the last time you saw that cat?
You should've explained everything to Tom.
I don't think that this is interesting at all.
Tom said that he was going to go back to sleep.
I know what's written on it because I'm the one that wrote it.
